headerDisplay: Awair plug-in for [Homebridge](https://github.com/nfarina/homebridge) using the native Awair API. Reference [Installation Instructions](https://github.com/DMBlakeley/homebridge-awair2#readme) for details on determining 'Developer Token'.
footerDisplay: If you have multiple Awair devices, use those IDs to create individual accessories. Be sure to uniquely 'name' each device.

token.title: Developer Token (REQUIRED)
token.description: Reference Installation Instructions - link provided above.

userType.title: The type of user account
userType.description: The type of user account. Default = 'users/self', Options: 'users/self' or `orgs/###`, where ### is the Awair Organization `orgId'.

airQualityMethod.title: Air quality calculation method
airQualityMethod.description: Air quality calculation method used to define the Air Quality Chracteristic. Default = `awair-score`, Options: 'awair-score' and `aqi`.

endpoint.title: The `air-data` endpoint
endpoint.description: The `air-data` endpoint to use. Default = '15-min-avg', Options: '15-min-avg', `5-min-avg`, `raw`, or `latest`.

polling_interval.title: Polling frequency
polling_interval.description: The frequency (units: seconds) that you would like to update the data in HomeKit. Default = `900` [15 minutes]. Recommended minimum is 900 for '15-min-avg', 300 for '5-min-avg' or 'latest', and 180 for 'raw'.

limit.title: Data Points Returned
limit.description: Number of consecutive 10 second data points returned per request, used for custom averaging of sensor values from `/raw` endpoint (OPTIONAL, default = `12` i.e. 2 minute average)

logging.title: Whether to output logs to the Homebridge logs

carbonDioxideThreshold.title: Carbon Dioxide Threshold
carbonDioxideThreshold.description: The CO2 level at which HomeKit will turn off the trigger alert for the CO2 in ppm, to ensure that it doesn't trigger on/off too frequently choose a number lower than `carbonDioxideThreshold`. Default = `0`.

carbonDioxideThresholdOff.title: Carbon Dioxide Threshold Off
carbonDioxideThresholdOff.description: The CO2 level at which HomeKit will turn off the trigger alert for the CO2 in ppm, to ensure that it doesn't trigger on/off too frequently choose a number lower than `carbonDioxideThreshold`. Default = 0.
